name: DOAB (Directory of Open Access Books) API
description: REST API for searching and accessing open access books metadata from DOAB directory. Provides comprehensive access to over 40,000 open access books with peer review information.

endpoints.description: Search DOAB books using query parameters
Access peer review information via PRISM API

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive API with peer review integration
research_notes.researcher_notes: Comprehensive directory with 40,000+ open access books. Includes peer review information through PRISM API integration.
research_notes.api_summary: DOAB API provides comprehensive access to the world's largest directory of open access books, offering searchable metadata for over 40,000 academic monographs. The API includes unique peer review information through PRISM integration, making it invaluable for researchers, librarians, and institutions seeking quality open access scholarly books across all academic disciplines.

name: OAPEN API
description: Open access platform for books with metadata feeds and services. Provides access to over 40,000 open access publications with comprehensive metadata in multiple formats.

endpoints.description: Access metadata feeds in various formats
endpoints.response_format: Multiple formats including ONIX, MARC, JSON

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - multiple standardized metadata formats
research_notes.researcher_notes: Provides comprehensive metadata feeds in industry-standard formats. Daily updates ensure current information.
research_notes.api_summary: OAPEN API offers access to a comprehensive collection of open access books through standardized metadata feeds in multiple formats including ONIX, MARC, and JSON. The platform serves over 40,000 open access publications with daily updates, making it essential for libraries, aggregators, and systems requiring high-quality bibliographic metadata for open access scholarly books.

name: OpenEdition Books API
description: API for accessing OpenEdition Books platform and Counter statistics. Provides access to humanities and social sciences open access books with usage analytics.

endpoints.description: Counter 5 service documentation and API access

research_notes.data_quality: Good - Counter 5 compliant usage statistics
research_notes.researcher_notes: Focuses on humanities and social sciences with Counter-compliant usage analytics. SUSHI protocol authentication.
research_notes.api_summary: OpenEdition Books API provides access to humanities and social sciences open access books with Counter 5 compliant usage statistics. Using SUSHI protocol authentication, it offers detailed analytics on book usage patterns, making it valuable for publishers, libraries, and researchers studying scholarly communication in humanities and social sciences disciplines.

name: OpenTextbooks API
description: API for BC Campus open textbooks collection and metadata. Provides access to open educational textbooks with comprehensive metadata and licensing information.

research_notes.data_quality: Good - comprehensive collection with GitHub documentation
research_notes.researcher_notes: Focus on open educational textbooks with comprehensive Creative Commons licensing information.
research_notes.api_summary: OpenTextbooks API provides access to BC Campus's comprehensive collection of open educational textbooks, offering detailed metadata and licensing information for freely available course materials. The API supports educational institutions and instructors seeking high-quality open textbooks across various disciplines, with clear Creative Commons licensing that enables adaptation and reuse.

name: OER Commons API
provider: Institute for the Study of Knowledge Management in Education (ISKME)
description: API for accessing Open Educational Resources metadata and content. Provides comprehensive access to OER materials with detailed licensing and educational metadata.

research_notes.data_quality: Good - comprehensive OER repository with detailed metadata
research_notes.researcher_notes: Requires API token for access. Comprehensive collection of OER materials with educational metadata standards.
research_notes.api_summary: OER Commons API provides access to one of the world's largest collections of open educational resources, offering comprehensive metadata and content for freely available teaching and learning materials. The API enables educators, institutions, and developers to discover and integrate high-quality OER content with detailed licensing information and educational standards alignment.

name: MIT OpenCourseWare API
description: API for accessing MIT OpenCourseWare course materials and metadata. Provides comprehensive access to MIT's open educational content and course materials.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - high-quality MIT educational content
research_notes.researcher_notes: Pioneer in open courseware with comprehensive course materials from MIT. GitHub-hosted development resources.
research_notes.api_summary: MIT OpenCourseWare API provides access to one of the world's most comprehensive collections of free university-level educational materials, offering complete course content from MIT across all disciplines. The API enables access to lectures, assignments, and course materials that have made high-quality education accessible globally, supporting millions of learners and educators worldwide.

name: OpenStax API
description: API for accessing OpenStax free textbooks and educational resources. Provides comprehensive access to high-quality, peer-reviewed open textbooks.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - high-quality peer-reviewed textbooks
research_notes.researcher_notes: High-quality, peer-reviewed open textbooks covering major academic disciplines. Strong adoption in higher education.
research_notes.api_summary: OpenStax API provides access to high-quality, peer-reviewed open textbooks that serve millions of students worldwide. Developed at Rice University, the platform offers comprehensive educational resources across major academic disciplines, with proven cost savings and learning outcomes that have transformed access to educational materials in higher education.

name: Dataverse API
description: Native API for Dataverse research data repository platform. Comprehensive platform for sharing, preserving, citing, and discovering research data with robust API access.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive research data platform
research_notes.researcher_notes: Leading open-source research data repository platform used by institutions worldwide. Comprehensive API with full CRUD operations.
research_notes.api_summary: Dataverse API provides comprehensive access to one of the world's leading open-source research data repository platforms, enabling researchers to share, preserve, cite, and discover research data. Developed at Harvard University, the platform serves thousands of institutions globally with robust metadata standards, version control, and integration capabilities essential for modern research data management.

name: Dryad API
description: Stash API for Dryad digital repository of research data. Curated repository for data underlying scientific publications with comprehensive metadata and DOI assignment.

access_info.pricing_model: free for access, fees for data publication

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - curated scientific data repository
research_notes.researcher_notes: Leading curated repository for data underlying scientific publications. Strong integration with scholarly publishing workflow.
research_notes.api_summary: Dryad API provides access to a premier curated repository for research data underlying scientific publications, offering comprehensive metadata and DOI assignment for datasets. The platform ensures data availability and citability, supporting reproducible research and compliance with data sharing mandates from funders and journals across all scientific disciplines.

name: Mendeley Data API
description: API for accessing Mendeley Data research datasets and metadata. Free research data repository with comprehensive metadata and integration with scholarly workflow.

research_notes.data_quality: Good - integrated with Elsevier scholarly ecosystem
research_notes.researcher_notes: Free research data repository integrated with Mendeley reference manager and Elsevier publishing ecosystem.
research_notes.api_summary: Mendeley Data API provides access to a free research data repository integrated with the broader Elsevier scholarly ecosystem, enabling researchers to store, share, and discover datasets with comprehensive metadata. The platform supports reproducible research and data sharing requirements while maintaining integration with reference management and publishing workflows.

name: UK Data Service API
description: API for accessing UK Data Service research data collections. National data service providing access to social and economic data for research and teaching.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - national data service with comprehensive collections
research_notes.researcher_notes: UK's national data service providing comprehensive access to social and economic data. Requires registration for data access.
research_notes.api_summary: UK Data Service API provides access to the UK's national collection of social and economic data, offering comprehensive datasets for research and teaching. The service maintains extensive longitudinal studies, survey data, and census information, making it essential for social scientists, economists, and policy researchers studying UK society and economy.

name: ICPSR API
description: API for Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research data. World's largest archive of social science data with comprehensive collections for research and teaching.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - world's largest social science data archive
research_notes.researcher_notes: World's largest archive of social science data. Requires institutional membership or individual subscription for access.
research_notes.api_summary: ICPSR API provides access to the world's largest archive of social science data, offering comprehensive collections of survey research, longitudinal studies, and experimental data. Serving over 750 member institutions globally, ICPSR maintains rigorous data standards and documentation, making it the premier resource for quantitative social science research and teaching.

name: GESIS Data Archive API
provider: GESIS - Leibniz Institute for the Social Sciences
description: API for GESIS Data Archive social science research data. Germany's largest infrastructure for social science data with international scope and comprehensive metadata.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - leading European social science data infrastructure
research_notes.researcher_notes: Germany's largest infrastructure for social science data with strong European and international scope. R package available for access.
research_notes.api_summary: GESIS Data Archive API provides access to Germany's largest infrastructure for social science data, offering comprehensive collections of survey data, cross-national studies, and longitudinal research. As a leading European data service, GESIS maintains high-quality metadata standards and supports comparative social research across European and international contexts.

name: Harvard Dataverse API
description: Native API for Harvard Dataverse research data repository. Flagship installation of the Dataverse platform with extensive research datasets across all disciplines.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - flagship Dataverse installation with extensive collections
research_notes.researcher_notes: Flagship installation of Dataverse platform hosting extensive research datasets from Harvard and collaborating institutions worldwide.
research_notes.api_summary: Harvard Dataverse API provides access to the flagship installation of the Dataverse platform, hosting extensive research datasets from Harvard University and collaborating institutions worldwide. The repository maintains comprehensive metadata standards and version control, serving as a model for institutional data repositories and supporting reproducible research across all academic disciplines.

name: re3data.org API
description: Registry of Research Data Repositories global registry API. Comprehensive registry providing information about research data repositories worldwide with detailed metadata.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive global registry with detailed metadata
research_notes.researcher_notes: Global registry of research data repositories with comprehensive metadata about repository policies, services, and characteristics.
research_notes.api_summary: re3data.org API provides access to the world's most comprehensive registry of research data repositories, offering detailed metadata about repository policies, services, and characteristics. The registry supports researchers, librarians, and data managers in discovering appropriate repositories for data deposit and reuse, promoting FAIR data principles and best practices in research data management.

name: Kaggle API
description: API for accessing Kaggle datasets, competitions, and kernels. World's largest data science community platform with machine learning datasets and competitions.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - world's largest data science community platform
research_notes.researcher_notes: World's largest data science community with comprehensive API for datasets, competitions, and notebooks. Strong Python CLI tools.
research_notes.api_summary: Kaggle API provides access to the world's largest data science community platform, offering comprehensive datasets, machine learning competitions, and code notebooks. The API enables researchers and practitioners to discover high-quality datasets, participate in competitions, and access community-contributed machine learning resources essential for data science education and research.

name: IEEE DataPort API
description: API for IEEE DataPort research datasets and data competitions. Platform for engineering and technology datasets with peer review and citation capabilities.

research_notes.data_quality: Good - limited public API documentation available
research_notes.researcher_notes: IEEE platform for engineering and technology datasets. Limited public API documentation, requires IEEE credentials for access.
research_notes.api_summary: IEEE DataPort API provides access to engineering and technology research datasets through IEEE's data platform, offering peer-reviewed data with citation capabilities. The platform supports the engineering research community with high-quality datasets across electrical engineering, computer science, and related disciplines, though access requires IEEE membership or subscription.

name: Registry of Research Data Repositories API
description: API for the global registry of research data repositories. Comprehensive registry providing detailed information about data repositories worldwide.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive global repository registry
research_notes.researcher_notes: Same as re3data.org API - comprehensive global registry of research data repositories with detailed metadata.
research_notes.api_summary: Registry of Research Data Repositories API provides access to the world's most comprehensive registry of research data repositories, offering detailed metadata about repository characteristics, policies, and services. The registry supports the global research community in discovering appropriate repositories for data sharing and reuse, promoting best practices in research data management and FAIR data principles.

name: OpenAIRE Research Graph API
description: API for accessing OpenAIRE Research Graph interconnected scholarly data. Comprehensive research graph connecting publications, datasets, projects, and organizations.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive European research infrastructure
research_notes.researcher_notes: Comprehensive research graph connecting European and global research outputs with projects, organizations, and funding information.
research_notes.api_summary: OpenAIRE Research Graph API provides access to one of the world's largest open scholarly communication graphs, connecting millions of research publications, datasets, projects, and organizations. The platform supports European research policy and open science initiatives, offering comprehensive metadata and relationship mapping essential for research assessment and discovery.

name: GenBank API
description: NCBI Entrez API for accessing GenBank genetic sequence database. Comprehensive database of DNA sequences with annotation and cross-references.

technical_info.auth_method: API key recommended for higher limits

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - premier genetic sequence database
research_notes.researcher_notes: World's primary genetic sequence database with comprehensive annotation and cross-references. Part of NCBI's extensive molecular biology resources.
research_notes.api_summary: GenBank API provides access to the world's most comprehensive collection of genetic sequence data through NCBI's Entrez system, offering DNA, RNA, and protein sequences with detailed annotations. The database serves as the foundation for molecular biology research, supporting genomics, bioinformatics, and evolutionary studies across all domains of life.

name: European Nucleotide Archive API
description: ENA Portal and Browser APIs for accessing European nucleotide sequence data. Comprehensive archive of nucleotide sequences with rich metadata and cross-references.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - comprehensive European nucleotide archive
research_notes.researcher_notes: European component of International Nucleotide Sequence Database Collaboration. Comprehensive documentation and multiple API access points.
research_notes.api_summary: European Nucleotide Archive API provides access to Europe's comprehensive nucleotide sequence archive, offering genomic and transcriptomic data with rich metadata and cross-references. As part of the global nucleotide sequence collaboration with GenBank and DDBJ, ENA serves the European research community with high-quality sequence data essential for genomics and bioinformatics research.

name: DNA Data Bank of Japan API
description: WABI web API for DDBJ sequence search and retrieval services. Japanese component of international nucleotide sequence database collaboration.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - part of international nucleotide sequence collaboration
research_notes.researcher_notes: Japanese component of international nucleotide database collaboration. Provides comprehensive sequence search and retrieval services.
research_notes.api_summary: DNA Data Bank of Japan API provides access to Japan's comprehensive nucleotide sequence database through web-based analysis interfaces, offering sequence search, retrieval, and BLAST analysis capabilities. As part of the international nucleotide sequence database collaboration, DDBJ serves the global research community with high-quality sequence data and bioinformatics tools.

name: UniProt API
description: RESTful API for UniProt protein sequence and functional information. Comprehensive resource for protein information with functional annotation and cross-references.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - world's leading protein information resource
research_notes.researcher_notes: World's most comprehensive resource for protein information with extensive functional annotation and cross-references.
research_notes.api_summary: UniProt API provides access to the world's most comprehensive resource for protein sequence and functional information, offering detailed annotation, cross-references, and search capabilities. The database serves as the primary reference for protein research, supporting molecular biology, biochemistry, and bioinformatics studies across all domains of life.

name: Protein Data Bank API
description: PDBe REST API for protein structure data and annotations. Comprehensive database of 3D protein structures with detailed annotations and cross-references.

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - world's primary protein structure database
research_notes.researcher_notes: World's primary database of 3D protein structures with comprehensive annotations and experimental details.
research_notes.api_summary: Protein Data Bank API provides access to the world's primary repository of 3D protein structures, offering detailed structural information, annotations, and experimental data. The database serves as the foundation for structural biology research, drug discovery, and molecular modeling, supporting researchers in understanding protein function through structure.

name: GEO (Gene Expression Omnibus) API
description: NCBI GEO API for accessing gene expression and genomic data. Comprehensive repository of functional genomics data with extensive metadata and analysis tools.

technical_info.auth_method: API key recommended for higher limits

research_notes.data_quality: Excellent - premier functional genomics database
research_notes.researcher_notes: World's largest repository of functional genomics data with comprehensive metadata and analysis capabilities. Part of NCBI's extensive molecular biology resources.
research_notes.api_summary: GEO API provides access to the world's largest repository of functional genomics data through NCBI's Gene Expression Omnibus, offering comprehensive gene expression datasets, microarray data, and RNA-seq experiments. The database serves as the primary resource for functional genomics research, supporting comparative studies, biomarker discovery, and systems biology approaches across all biological systems.
